game.name: AIKAGI
game.shortDescription: Sunohara Nozomu finds himself at his wits' end when his parents told him to move out on his own to learn how to become more independent, but he's having trouble finding a place that feels like home. That's when his childhood friend, Takanashi Shiori, gives the conflicted Nozomu a shocking request...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sunohara Nozomu finds himself at his wits' end when his parents told him to move out on his own to learn how to become more independent, but he's having trouble finding a place that feels like home. That's when his childhood friend, Takanashi Shiori, gives the conflicted Nozomu a shocking request...

reviewHighlights.text: A cute story about 2 awkward individuals who have known each other for so long learning to love and recognize their charm though the mean of living to...
Very vanilla & wholesome, worth losing NNN to There's also an "anime" adaption where I first discovered this vn
